extendedInfo.description: Do you need a daily source of inspiration? Are you looking for purpose and meaning? This app has all the great quotes from African Americans that will inspire you or provide you the wisdom and knowledge that you seek. Learn from those who have faced your struggles, yet managed to succeed.Inspiring Black Quotations has over 700 quotes from African-Americans and blacks around the world. You can share your favorite quotes on Facebook or Twitter. You can also submit your favorite quotes to share with other app users. Features:1.	Search for quotes by author2.	Quotes listed by author in alphabetical order3.	Share quotes via Facebook, Twitter, email and text-messaging4.	Add quotes to your favorites5.	Submit your own quotes to share6.	Daily quotes presented as "Todayâs Inspiration"7. Hundreds of short biographies of famous African AmericansInspiring Black Quotations was created by HighLife Tech. Our mission is to promote the idea, via educational and entertaining mobile apps, that in the black community, all we need is each other in order to learn and succeed.
